name: provide_flirt_options
description: Generate structured flirtatious reply options based on the conversation context and user profile.

match_name.description: The name of the person we are talking to, extracted from the image header if possible. Default to 'Unknown' if not visible.

confidence_score.description: Confidence score of the vibe read from 1-10.

vibe_read.description: A 1-2 sentence assessment of the current vibe and the match's interest level.

draft_replies.description: List of reply options categorized by flavor.

explanation.description: Why this reply works for this specific vibe.

follow_up_question.description: A high-quality open-ended question to keep the momentum going if the conversation stalls.

if_they_go_quiet_message.description: A low-pressure 're-ping' message to use if they don't reply within 24-48 hours.

thing_to_avoid_next.description: Critically analyze common pitfalls in this specific context and identify one thing the user should NOT do next.
